title: What is the future of medical imaging? - Quora

response.answer_text: Medical imaging is in light speed development than before, the big companies investing in artificial intelligence technology to simplify decisions and view. For example observing MRI technology it is well known for scanning and widely used by neurosurgeons and physicians and helped a lot in brain surgeries. The technology now introduced 3T intraoperative MRI to perform effective brain surgeries.  What is Intraoperative 3T MRI Scan. 3T intraoperative MRI works along with brain surgery. The neurosurgeon can scan patient brain during surgery time without sending patient to MRI scan room to measure surgery success. 3T MRI or IMRI technology reduced the number of surgeries and reduced the recovery time and hospital stay. Like this the future of imaging technology may simplify detecting early stage cancers.

With the rising prevalence of chronic diseases, such as cancer and various other cardiovascular disorders, the global market for medical image analysis software has witnessed a substantial rise in its size and scope. Analysts foresee an upward growth is this market over the next few years, thanks to the advent of 4D imaging technique and the swelling demand for medical imaging. The market, which presented an opportunity worth US$2.35 bn in 2015, is anticipated to expand at an 8.10% CAGR between 2016 and 2024 and touch a value of US$4.66 bn by the end of 2024.
